metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5946 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Zip::File component in the rubyzip gem before 1.2.1 for Ruby has a directory traversal vulnerability. If a site allows uploading of .zip files, an attacker can upload a malicious file that uses "../" pathname substrings to write arbitrary files to the filesystem.

criterions.comment: ruby-zip package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-1.1').
